scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && webpack --progress --config webpack.config.js && cp -r node_modules/monaco-editor/min web/resources && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-treeview/dist/* web/resources  && cp -r node_modules/raml-language-server-browser web/resources
scripts.publish_web: rimraf gh-pages && npm run build && mkdir gh-pages && cd gh-pages && git clone https://github.com/ddenisenko/raml-server-monaco-example.git --branch gh-pages --single-branch . && find . ! -name '.git' ! -name '.' ! -name '..' -maxdepth 1 -exec rm -rf {} + && cp -r ../web/* . && git add -A && git commit -m 'Updating web version' && git push
